example.parse: (TOP (S (CONJ وِ) (SBAR-TMP (SUB_CONJ لَمّا) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS عَرَف) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ إِنّ) (S (NP-SBJ (PRON_1P ِنا)) (NP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL مُسْلِمِين))))))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS قال) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR (-NONE- 0) (S (NP-TPC-1 (PRON_1S أَنا)) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART مِش)) (PRT (PROG_PART بِ)) (IV1S+IV أَسَكِّن) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL مُسْلِمِين))))))))
